body.name: Lortsybab 2-in-1 Baby Stroller with Bassinet Mode - Folding Infant Newborn Pram Stroller with Reversible Seat - Toddler Strollers for 0-36 Months Old Babies (Beige)
features: 2 in 1 Baby Stroller: Our stroller can be a high landscape bassinet stroller, your baby can enjoy the scenery outside, and will not be polluted by automobile exhaust. The convertible stroller offers the flexibility for baby to face you or be able to see all of the scenery around them while facing outwards.

Adjustable Canopy & Backrest: The canopy with additional sun visors can well protect your baby from UV radiation. Adopt three section canopy designed, it can adjust freely according to different weather conditions, providing the best rest environment for baby. In addition, the backrest can also be adjusted by tighten the adjustable belt under the sleeping basket into sleeping mode, semi-recline mode and sitting mode to meet the different requirements of your baby.

Safety Design: With anti-shock design, each front wheel with two high-quality shock absorption springs and the sleeping basket of the stroller is a suspension frame design to absorb shocks and protect the baby’s brain and body. The front wheels can 360°rotate or be locked in one direction, the one-touch brake allows you to quickly brake the two rear wheels. 5-point seat belt ensure the safety of the baby, safety wrist strap to prevent it from slipping away.

Multifunctional & Practical Baby Stroller: Our infant stroller is ideal for an easy and active lifestyle. EVA rubber wheels are not only durable, but also have good grip, suitable for all kinds of roads. Eco-friendly fabrics are not easily torn or punctured. Roomy storage basket under the seat holds all baby’s essentials.

Comfort and Quick Folding: With one-hand quick folding design makes it more convenient for outdoor travel or indoor storage. Adjustable handrail, suitable for parents of various heights. Foot cover can keep warm in the cold season, allowing the baby to sleep more comfy. This pram is suitable for newborn to 36 months old babies.

reviews.reviewText: This stroller is amazing! Super easy to put together didn’t need the instructions at all. It looks nice, is super smooth. My baby is comfortable. It’s easy to change the seat around. It goes from bassinet to seat really quick and easy. I’m excited to use it. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A risky choice
reviews.reviewText: My recent experience with the Lortsybab 2-in-1 Baby Stroller left me thoroughly disappointed, and I feel compelled to share my concerns:Construction and Durability: Its construction is weak and subpar. The stroller feels flimsy and not as sturdy as one would expect, especially when it comes to a product meant to ensure the safety and comfort of a baby. Maybe suitable for 0-3 months, but I wouldn't recommend it for a baby older than that. The carrier wiggles a lot and is held by cheap pieces of plastic. If those pieces were to break, the carrier will tilt, which is extremely worrying to put a baby in one of these. The lack of robustness and the carrier's instability raise doubts about its durability and long-term use.Bassinet Mode Inefficiency: The promise of a "2-in-1" stroller with a bassinet mode was intriguing, but the execution fell short of expectations. The bassinet mode is far from comfortable for a baby. The lack of adequate padding and support made me question whether it's suitable for extended use, particularly for newborns who require utmost comfort and security.Difficulty in Maneuvering: Maneuvering this stroller proved to be a cumbersome task. The wheels did not glide smoothly, making it a struggle to push the stroller, especially on uneven surfaces. This lack of maneuverability can be frustrating for parents trying to navigate various terrains.Lack of Practical Features: I found the stroller lacking in practical features that are often considered essential for baby strollers. These missing elements include proper storage options for baby essentials, sunshade effectiveness, and adjustable seating positions for the baby's comfort.Furthermore, I encountered significant issues after returning the item. Regrettably, I didn't receive a refund, despite following the return process correctly. To add to the frustration, Amazon's customer service was unhelpful in resolving the matter. This added inconvenience only exacerbated the disappointment associated with this purchase.The Lortsybab 2-in-1 Baby Stroller with Bassinet Mode failed to meet my expectations on multiple fronts. Its questionable construction, inefficiencies in bassinet mode, difficulty in maneuvering, and lack of practical features make it an unsuitable choice for parents seeking a reliable and safe stroller for their baby. I would strongly recommend exploring other options in the market for a more reliable and baby-friendly stroller. While I appreciate the concept, the execution leaves much to be desired, and the lack of adequate customer support further sours the experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am upset that it came with small stains on it right of out of the box and I threw the box out, if I would have the box I’d return it just for the fact the shipped something to me that has stains on it .

reviews.reviewText: I love the stroller it’s self, it’s great in height the space between the seat & basket is great, easy to put together all though it’s says recommended for babies 0-36 I think but the seat it’s self is not considering long babies my baby is only 22 months and tall enough to be a 3 year old, I loved it but not long enough for my baby to lay on
